pasuwa 1891di anagarika dharmapalathumata aaradhanayak labi amarika eksath janapadaye chikago nuwarapawathi aagamparlimenthu sasiyata sahabhagi wi budu dahama alala buddha gayawa pathwa athi shochaniyathaththwaya pahadili karamin deshana dekak dharmapalathuma wisin pawathwana ladi.ethumage ingi්rasi bhashamaya kathikathwaya, karunu idiripath kirima saha deha wilashaya, andum wilashaya ganasesu samajika piris athi mahath pi්rathiyata path wuha.bodu dahama gana palamu warata amarikawe handak nagime gaurawaya dharmapalathumata pirinamunuathara, pasukalinawa amarikawe bauddha katayuthu sandaha amarikanu mahacharya pol karus,boni, ee.siheglar yanamahathwarunge aaradhanaya paridi dharmapala thuma dewani warata amarikawata giyeya.
